qa.name: Luna
qa.essence: Haunted dreamer with a mysterious past
qa.appearance: Pale skin, long dark hair, and violet eyes

hf.name: Phantom Musician
hf.essence: Ethereal being tied to the melody
hf.appearance: Translucent figure with glowing blue eyes

json_to_edit.voice_over: The melody echoed through my dreams, a siren call I couldn't escape.
json_to_edit.description: Luna is haunted by a mysterious melody in her recurring dreams.
json_to_edit.name: Melody of Dreams
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Luna experiences a recurring dream where a mysterious melody leads her through surreal landscapes.

qa.action: Luna standing in a misty dreamscape, surrounded by floating musical notes.

hf.action: Luna's face shows a mix of fear and fascination as she follows the melody.

tr.action: Luna's violet eyes widen as she spots the Phantom Musician in the distance.

xc.action: Camera follows Luna as she walks through a corridor of swirling mist.

ka.action: From behind Luna, we see the Phantom Musician playing an otherworldly instrument.

fn.action: The dreamscape begins to tilt and shift as Luna approaches the Phantom Musician.

af.action: Luna's pupil dilates as she wakes up, the melody fading.

edit_command: Add three new shots to intensify the surreal nature of the dream sequence. Include a shot where Luna is surrounded by floating musical instruments, another where she's running through a maze of giant piano keys, and a final shot where she reaches out to touch the Phantom Musician but her hand passes through them. Also, describe these new shots in detail.

updated_json.voice_over: The melody echoed through my dreams, a siren call I couldn't escape.
updated_json.description: Luna is haunted by a mysterious melody in her recurring dreams.
updated_json.name: Melody of Dreams
updated_json.scene_summary: Luna experiences a recurring dream where a mysterious melody leads her through surreal landscapes.

qa.action: Luna standing in a misty dreamscape, surrounded by floating musical notes.

hf.action: Luna's face shows a mix of fear and fascination as she follows the melody.

tr.action: Luna's violet eyes widen as she spots the Phantom Musician in the distance.

bp.action: Luna is surrounded by floating, translucent musical instruments. Violins, flutes, and harps orbit around her, playing fragments of the haunting melody.

xc.action: Camera follows Luna as she walks through a corridor of swirling mist.

ka.action: From behind Luna, we see the Phantom Musician playing an otherworldly instrument.

fn.action: The dreamscape begins to tilt and shift as Luna approaches the Phantom Musician.

lm.action: Luna runs through a labyrinth made of giant, glowing piano keys. The keys light up and play notes as she steps on them, adding to the melody.

af.action: Luna's pupil dilates as she wakes up, the melody fading.

rz.action: Luna reaches out to touch the Phantom Musician. Her hand moves in slow motion, passing through the translucent figure like mist, causing ripples in its form.

label.rationale: we will add three new shots to intensify the surreal nature of the dream sequence as requested. these shots will be inserted between the existing shots to create a more immersive and fantastical experience. we'll update the "number_of_shots" from 7 to 10 and add detailed descriptions for the new shots. the new shots will be added to the "shots" dictionary and the "list_display_order" will be updated accordingly. this will enhance the dreamlike quality of the scene and provide a more vivid representation of luna's surreal journey.

value.action: Luna is surrounded by floating, translucent musical instruments. Violins, flutes, and harps orbit around her, playing fragments of the haunting melody.
Luna runs through a labyrinth made of giant, glowing piano keys. The keys light up and play notes as she steps on them, adding to the melody.
Luna reaches out to touch the Phantom Musician. Her hand moves in slow motion, passing through the translucent figure like mist, causing ripples in its form.
